mapper.update:
update system_menu_info
system_menu_name = #{systemMenuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
system_menu_type = #{systemMenuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
system_menu_icon = #{systemMenuIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

data_region_id = #{dataRegionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

last_update_date = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where system_menu_id = #{systemMenuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
select
from system_menu_info
data_status_flag = #{dataStatusFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND system_menu_id IN (SELECT x.system_menu_id FROM system_role_relation x where x.system_role_id = #{systemRoleId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
ORDER BY system_menu_id ASC

SELECT b.role_relation_id AS roleRelationId, b.system_role_id AS systemRoleId, a.system_menu_id AS systemMenuId, a.system_menu_name AS systemMenuName, a.system_menu_type AS systemMenuType, a.system_menu_icon AS systemMenuIcon, a.system_menu_url AS systemMenuUrl, a.system_parent_id AS systemParentId, a.system_menu_close AS systemMenuClose, a.system_menu_desc AS systemMenuDesc, a.first_create_by AS firstCreateBy, a.first_create_date AS firstCreateDate, a.data_status_flag AS dataStatusFlag, a.data_region_id AS dataRegionId, a.data_change_type AS dataChangeType, a.data_change_desc AS dataChangeDesc, a.last_update_by AS lastUpdateBy, a.last_update_date AS lastUpdateDate FROM system_menu_info a JOIN system_role_relation b ON a.system_menu_id = b.system_menu_id WHERE b.system_role_id = #{systemRoleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
